In England, in the seven days to 13 February, there were 304,633 new confirmed cases (538.7 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 06 February, there were 449,320 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 32% (144,687 fewer cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 18 February is 15,803,539 (27,946.1 cases per 100,000 population).
